table.name: vtiger_villes
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_villes` ( `villesid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `villenum` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `codepostal` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `nom` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `pays` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `zone` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`villesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_villescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_villescf` ( `villesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`villesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
